description.value:
Activate Cast a Spell

On certain rare occasions, when a particularly despoiled tree or a powerful demonic fungal infestation (such as a Jeharlu Spore) is destroyed, the grimy black ash that remains behind functions as a catalyst called black ash. A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Thorns] empowered with this catalyst gains the fungus trait and appears diseased and toxic, with greasy filaments of dripping fungus growing through its vines. A creature damaged by this wall's thorns takes an additional @Damage[3d6[persistent,poison]].
